name: Tales of Landor - 2D MMORPG
description:
This game is still in alpha phase!

Be a part of game development process and join our community of players shaping the future of our upcoming indie 2D MMORPG! With focus on action combat, character progression, and player-driven stories, this pixel-perfect world is just beginning to take shape. Currently in alpha phase, you have the unique opportunity to witness the game's growth and even contribute your own ideas. Battle for glory alongside other players and become a legendary hero. Sign up now and be a part of this exciting journey from the start!

Join our Discord server to give us your feedback, get in touch with the team and other players and report bugs. You can also provide ideas.

We are already developing this ambitious game projct for several years and finally want to share it with you.
